definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Plastic bottles and buckets, even the sole of a shoe are all on display.
sentences.chinese: 塑料瓶和塑料桶，甚至还有鞋底都在那里展示。

sentences.english: Players may wear a pair of thick socks and lights, soft-soled running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 参加者可穿一对厚袜子及轻而鞋底较软的跑鞋。

sentences.english: The machine is with accessories and suitable for the Binging of insole.
sentences.chinese: 随机配有附件，可用于鞋底包中底。

sentences.english: Cork and leather footbed for added comfort.
sentences.chinese: 软木和皮革鞋底，增加舒适度。

sentences.english: A little while, a good-looking sole mat is completed.
sentences.chinese: 不多时，一个好看的鞋底垫就完成了。

sentences.english: Yue Yuen relies heavily on petrochemical derivatives to produce shoe soles and linings.
sentences.chinese: 裕元严重地依靠石化原料来生产鞋底和内衬。

sentences.english: In front of the tongue and soles can also be found on the trapeze a little red flag.
sentences.chinese: 而在鞋舌和鞋底前端的飞人标志上还可见些许白色。

sentences.english: Shoes wear out, it's not the way to the head.
sentences.chinese: 鞋底磨穿了，不等于路走到了头。

sentences.english: Using the paper patterns, cut two pieces of the sole and two pieces of the upper out of the wadding.
sentences.chinese: 利用纸模板，在填充棉上剪出两个鞋底和两片鞋面。

sentences.english: Mike: They even have special insoles to support the arches of my feet.
sentences.chinese: 皮鞋一般在鞋底回油软垫，可以支撑脚掌的拱形部位。

sentences.english: Who knows what hidden messages in Chinese characters are molded into other shoe soles.
sentences.chinese: 谁知道其它鞋底压膜的汉字隐藏了啥意思不。

sentences.english: A deodorant healthcare layer is respectively clamped between the sole and the liner and between the upper and the lining layer.
sentences.chinese: 在鞋底与衬垫和鞋帮与衬层之间夹设有防臭保健层。

sentences.english: He found a secure foothold and pulled himself up.
sentences.chinese: 用几根带儿把鞋底固定在脚上的一种鞋。

sentences.english: The new Oh, one did not pass through, super-soft soles, very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 全新的哦，一次没穿过，鞋底超级软，很舒服的。

sentences.english: Its used to determine the peeling strength between the sole and the upper of a shoe .
sentences.chinese: 本机适用于检验成鞋鞋底和鞋帮之间的剥离强度。

definition: toe box (of a shoe)/shoe last (shoemaker's tool)
fitting one's feet (of shoes or socks)
outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
